bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: William H. Davis was a citizen of Rockbridge County who served as a Confederate foot soldier in the American Civil War.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The collection contains transcripts and copies of William H. Davis's letters home to his wife Millie, from Monterey, Petersburg, and other Confederate army posts in Virginia. The material is a record of a common, unlettered man pouring out his homesickness to his wife.
